overview: Paul is a cofounder and CTO. Paul’s career spans over twenty years. He started with a position as a UNIX systems administrator for the first Internet Service Provider in Europe. Paul built up a vast amount of industry experience as a software engineer and technical architect in a variety of blue chip organizations, leading to experience in the telecommunications, international finance and retail sectors. After that he was the founder and CEO of Lovefilm.com, now owned by Amazon. He then was a cofounder and CTO of a taxation software suite known as Identity, now owned by Deloitte. In March 2010, Paul joined medCrowd to develop digital solutions that meet the needs of the healthcare community. He uses his extensive technical knowledge to build flexible solutions to ensure the ongoing evolution of our platforms.
